column4: hi all When I enter the command "route" sometimes it takes ages before anything comes up. any idea why this could be? Sometimes it's lightning quick...
if that's faster, route is waiting to resolve names for IP addresses but fails

I added the static ip's to the /etc/hosts and "route" speeds up a bit. I tried wiresharking my connection; everything seems so clear now. Even so clear I can see my company's dns isn't working very well... :) (wins/dns mix :( )
